Text:
A bad day for me today.

I riped a movie today, it took 5 hours for ripping and finally when i uploaded, i got an error

Error Name : Could not connect to remote server.

I faced the same problem few months ago and it kept me offline for a while.

From 31st December 2010 to February 5th 2011 i had the same issue, I was able to do every thing except uploading.

Only difference is that it was TPB at that time, and now its aha-share & ET which is giving me the same error.

Not only me, there are more people who had the same problem.

http://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=83595&highlight=Cannot+upload+torrents+-+page+does+not+load

Thank god TPB is working , i hope i will come back soon.... :D
thank god i somehow managed to uplad it... :)
